title: Password Key Manager
description: Password safe for any web, mobile or desktop application encrypting passwords, fully scalable and scalable with user authentication and scope of permissions for each password and file control.

title: Mail Massive
description: My first Vue application. I wanted to learn Vue so I created this GitHub profile viewing app.

title: Spotify Clone Web Api
description: Spotify cloning project, client made with react and api rest using node and the spotify api to access the music tracks.

title: To Do List Mobile
description: Learning about react-native, I did my first TO DO LIST project using the expo for the android and ios build.

title: ReactLMS
description: Remote study project aiming to be a study platform. It can be instantiated for each institution so that they can register their contents, videos, texts and documents for their respective students to access from wherever they are.
